TOKENLIGHTCONDITION.Effects.Dark.Name: Dark
TOKENLIGHTCONDITION.Effects.Dim.Name: Dim
TOKENLIGHTCONDITION.Effects.Light.Name: Light
Enable to add lighting condition effects to tokens. Disable to only track lighting with flags (TokenHUD will still work).
TOKENLIGHTCONDITION.Settings.DelayCalcul: Delays the light condition calculation by the configured miliseconds.
TOKENLIGHTCONDITION.Settings.GlobalIllum: Enable use of Global Illumination settings in determining token light conditions.
TOKENLIGHTCONDITION.Settings.NegativeLig: Negative luminance will provide dim or dark conditions instead of removing them.
TOKENLIGHTCONDITION.Settings.ShowTokenHu: Choose to display the Hud element when right clicking on token.
